pages.text: This chapter will cover all objectives that are available to complete The Vault. $(br2)Unsealed Vault Crystals can roll several objectives of the Vault. Apply a seal to force the objective of a Vault. New objectives might be added on later.

pages.title: Objective rolls
pages.text: $(br)$(li)$(l)Level 0-9:$() 100% Monolith $(br)$(li)$(l)Level 10-19:$() 50% Monolith, 50% Elixir $(br)$(li)$(l)Level 20-49:$() 33% Monolith, 33% Elixir, 33% Scavenger $(br)$(li)$(l)Level 50+:$() 25% Monolith, 25% Elixir, 25% Scavenger, 25% Hunt the Guardians

pages.title: Monolith Objective
pages.text: Light the required $(l)Monoliths$(). $(br2)Once all have been lit, exit the vault through the portal to complete the objective. $(br2)A $(l)Monolith Crate$() is rewarded when this Vault is succesfully completed.

pages.title: Monolith Objective
pages.text: Monoliths can spawn in every room, not neccesarily in sight. $(br2)The $(l)Hunter$() ability with the specialization $(l)Observer$() visualizes a monolith when activated inside that room.

pages.title: Elixer Objective
pages.text: The Elixer objective rolls from level 10 onwards. Fill the $(l)Elixer bar$() by looting chests, mining ores and killing mobs. $(br2)Once the bar is full, find a $(l)lodestone$() to complete the objective. $(br2)In a $(l)cooperative$() Elixer Vault, each player needs to find their own lodestone.

pages.title: Elixer Objective
pages.text: No Elixer Vault is the same. The amount of elixer contributed by either looting chests, mining ores or killing mobs differs per Vault run. The $(l)purple Elixer balls$() are only a visual aspect and do not need to be picked up. $(br2)A $(l)Seal of the Sage$() can be used to force the Elixer objective.

pages.title: Hunt the Guardians
pages.text: Find the required $(l)Obelisks$() and activate them to spawn $(l)Vault Guardians$(). The total number of Obelisks to activate and the corresponding Vault Guardians to defeat is displayed in the HUD on the top middle. This objective is completed when all obelisks have been activated and all Guardians have been defeated.

pages.title: Hunt the Guardians
pages.text: When completed, the player will be automatically teleported out of The Vault and rewarded with a $(l)Boss Crate$(). $(br2)This objective can be forced with the use of the $(l)Seal of the Executioner.$()

pages.title: Scavenger Hunt
pages.text: Collect all required items and hand in the items at the $(l)Scavenger Altar$(). $(br2)The HUD displayed on the top middle of the screen shows where to get the required items. In a cooperative Vault, each player has their own respective set of items to collect.

pages.title: Scavenger Hunt
pages.text: Excess Scavenger Items collected cannot be used in a later vault. Use them in a $(l)Soul Diffuser$() to gain $(l)Soul Dust$() $(br2)A $(l)Scavenger Crate$() is rewarded when completed. $(br2)This objective can be forced with the use of the $(l)Seal of the Hunter.$()

pages.title: Cake Hunt
pages.text: Find the cakes that are scattered around the Vault Rooms. $(l)Pink fog$() appears when the player is near a cake. The number of cakes is $(l)unlimited$(), the player can decide at whatever point to stop collecting. Each room has a 10% chance to spawn a $(l)Crake Pedestal$(), which completes The Vault for the player who activates it.

pages.title: Cake Hunt
pages.text: Note that in a cooperative Vault, each player needs to find their own Crake Pedestal to complete The Vault. $(br2)A $(l)Crake$() is rewarded when this Vault is succesfully completed. $(br)This objective can be forced with the use of the $(l)Seal of the Confectioner.$()

pages.title: Architect Vault
pages.text: A Vault without an objective, the $(l)Architect Vault$(), is a Vault you build by your own chosen inscriptions after combining a crystal with a $(l)Seal of the Architect$(). The higher the completion, the more blocks of The Vault will be generated. Mind the time, it will be limited to a maximum of 4 minutes. More on inscriptions, //TODO INSERT LINK HERE
